      • getCommandArguments

        public java.lang.String[] getCommandArguments(java.lang.String configFilePath,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionMap,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> removals)
        Get the formatted String array of command line arguments to execute when we call out to the system utility to store the config.
        Parameters:
        configFilePath - path to config file to update
        optionMap - Map of key/value pairs to update local config with.
        removals - List of keys that will be removed Note that they have preference over the updated keys
        Returns:
        String[] array of arguments.
